Container.Name: multi-scrobbler
Container.Overview: Track your music listening history from api-based sources like Spotify, Plex (Tautulli), Subsonic (Airsonic), Jellyfin, Mopidy, Deezer, JRiver and record to Last.fm, Maloja, and Listenbrainz
Container.Description: Track your music listening history from api-based sources Spotify, Plex (Tautulli), Subsonic (Airsonic), Jellyfin, Mopidy, Deezer, JRiver and record to Last.fm, Maloja, and Listenbrainz
